page.title: 02DAY IN THE LIFE OF J.PICKLES
page.content: When I'm woken up in the morning by my super-sonic clock radio, I reach down to my{record player,}and put on a record by Michael Jackson. Next my uniform! Then I scramble an egg in the {Microwave,}and put on the coffee maker. Kirsten calls for me. We walk to the bus stop. I have a Boring day at school and I can't wait for the bell. When it does go, I go to home and put on my jeans, jumper, and coat, and go for Kirsten. Then we walk to the Summer seat, or sit by the river. At 7.pm we go to the {youth club.}We usually sit behind the {disco unit,}or have a game of{pool.}I go home at 9.30pm, up the stairs at 10.00pm, and watch{television}in bed.
